description: Creates CycloneDX SBOMs from Maven projects

description: Creates CycloneDX SBOMs from .NET projects via GitHub action

description: Creates CycloneDX SBOMs from PHP Composer projects via GitHub action

description: Creates CycloneDX SBOMs from Python projects via GitHub action

description: Creates CycloneDX SBOMs from Erlang/Elixir Mix projects via GitHub action

name: cdxgen
description: GitHub action for CycloneDX BOM generator (cdxgen). cdxgen produced bom xml file can be uploaded to Dependency-Track, AppThreat, and other commercial Software Composition Analysis (SCA) products

name: OpenSource Review Toolkit (ORT)
description: A suite of tools to assist with reviewing open source software dependencies.

name: Retire.js
description: Scanner that detects the use of JavaScript libraries with known vulnerabilities

name: Dependency-Track
description: Supply Chain Component Analysis platform that allows organizations to identify and reduce risk from the use of third-party and open source components

name: Dependency-Track Jenkins Plugin
description: Publishes SBOMs to Dependency-Track for per-build analysis, result visualization, and configurable risk thresholds

name: dtrack-audit
description: Publishes SBOMs to Dependency-Track for analysis and displays visualization from the command-line

name: ShiftLeft Scan
description: An open-source security tool for modern DevSecOps teams that can detect various kinds of security flaws in your application and infrastructure code in a single fast scan

name: SCANOSS
description: An open source inventory engine built for modern development teams

name: oss_inventory
description: Import CycloneDX BOMs and see OSS statistics

name: Auditjs
description: Audits an NPM package.json file to identify known vulnerabilities

name: Chelsea
description: Dependency vulnerability auditor for Ruby

name: Jake
description: An OSS Index integration to check your Conda environments for vulnerable Open Source packages

name: Nancy
description: A tool to check for vulnerabilities in your Golang dependencies, powered by Sonatype OSS Index

name: Go Sonatypes
description: Common utility packages for working with OSS Index, Nexus IQ Server, CycloneDX SBOMs or getting a user-agent

name: Valaa Stack
description: SBoMDoc is a VDoc extension which uses CycloneDX namespaces and can emit BOM documents in various formats

name: Nexus IQ
description: Software Composition Analysis (SCA) platform that can consume, analyze, and produce CycloneDX SBOMs

name: Nexus Lifecycle Jenkins Plugin
description: Publishes CycloneDX SBOMs to Nexus IQ for per-build analysis, result visualization, and policy evaluation

name: MedScan
description: Consumes SBOM’s for helping hospitals manage medical device assets

name: Reliza Hub
description: Publishes Reliza Hub metadata as SBOM for use in other tools or ingests SBOMs produced in other tools to update Reliza Hub metadata

name: SwiftBOM
description: Generates SBOMs for demo and PoC purposes

name: DtrackAuditor
description: Publishes SBOMs to Dependency-Track for analysis and results through command line.

name: Syft
description: CLI tool and library for generating a Software Bill of Materials from container images and filesystems.

name: Grype
description: A vulnerability scanner for container images and filesystems.

name: CycloneDX CLI
description: A command line tool incorporating many common utilities including converting between SBOM formats.

name: CycloneDX Web Tool
description: A web based tool incorporating many common utilities including converting between SBOM formats.

name: CycloneDX Rust
description: A Rust library to encode and decode the CycloneDX object model

name: CycloneDX for Cocoapods
description: Creates CycloneDX SBOMs for iOS Objective-C and Swift projects

name: mdbom
description: Transforms CycloneDX SBOMs to Markdown

name: OpenRewrite
description: Rewrite is a mass refactoring system, designed to eliminate technical debt across an engineering. The project can generate CycloneDX SBOMs when refactoring

name: Defect Dojo
description: Open source vulnerability management and automation platform that can import CycloneDX SBOMs containing vulnerability information

name: OSS Inventory
description: Imports CycloneDX SBOMs and visualizes OSS statistics

name: Fortress File Integrity Assurance
description: Creates SBOM from binary or archive, consumes externally provided SBOM, enriches SBOM with Fortress risk analysis, integrates via API to support continuous monitoring of software assurance.

name: Fortress Asset 2 Vendor
description: Comprehensive Cyber Supply Chain Risk Management data library that ingests, analyzes and securely shares SBOMs, HBOMs and other supply chain attestations via SaaS and permissioned blockchain solutions to facilitate Supplier to Asset Owner trust conversations.

name: Software Assurance Guardian Point Man
description: SAG-PM processes CycloneDX SBOM’s as part of a seven step software supply chain risk assessment

name: Cybeats SBOM Studio
description: Analyzes IoT firmware and generates SBOMs with the runtime data information for more precise identification of vulnerabilities and exploits abilities

name: TrustSource
description: TrustSource is a SaaS platform for implementing and maintaining open source compliance (ISO 5230 compliant). It can import CycloneDX, match them with its own information and add them to projects as modules for further analysis.

name: JDisc Discovery
description: Network discovery and IT inventory that can discover CycloneDX SBOMs on enterprise assets and ingest component inventory into the platform.

name: PulseUno Plugin for Dimensions CM
description: PulseUno enables development teams to continually build and inspect the health and quality of code using plugins such as CycloneDX. Teams can use this information to help decide when changes are ready to be merged, deployed, and released.

name: CycloneDX GoMod Generate SBOM
description: GitHub action which generates CycloneDX SBOMs from Go modules

name: BOM Repository Server
description: A lightweight repository server used to publish, manage, and distribute CycloneDX SBOMs

name: ittosai
description: ittosai is a CycloneDX SBOM vulnerability analyzer that analyzes SBOMs every time a developer commits code to a repository

name: CodeSentry
description: Software Composition Analysis (SCA) platform that leverages binary analysis to identify components, inherited risk, and communicates inventory through CycloneDX SBOMs

name: Heimdall
description: Automatically extract or manually upload your Software Bill of Materials (SBOM), and Heimdall will, on a continual basis, identify known vulnerabilities affecting your software components

name: Contrast Security
description: Automatically generates component inventory from runtime analysis (IAST or RASP) and generates CycloneDX SBOMs

name: Salus
description: Salus is a tool for coordinating the execution of security scanners. Salus can generate CycloneDX SBOMs from many language ecosystems.

name: Codenotary vcn
description: Protects an organizations software development pipeline from supply chain attacks. Codenotary natively supports CycloneDX SBOMs.

name: CodeNotary CAS
description: CAS is an open source attestation service for the community. Notarize and authorize files, directories, git repos and Build SBOMs of containers. CAS natively supports CycloneDX SBOMs.

name: Codenotary CAS Notarize Docker Image and SBOM
description: A GitHub Action which notarizes and creates an SBOM for Docker images.

name: Codenotary CAS Authenticate Docker Image and SBOM
description: A GitHub Action which authenticates notarized Docker images and SBOMs.

name: Cosign
description: Container Signing, Verification and Storage in an OCI registry, including CycloneDX SBOMs

name: Tern
description: Tern is a software composition analysis tool and Python library that generates a Software Bill of Materials for container images and Dockerfiles.

name: Cybellum SBOM
description: Analyzes binary artifacts to generate SBoM including context based analysis to perform accurate vulnerability assessment

name: Scancode Toolkit
description: ScanCode detects licenses, copyrights, package manifests & dependencies and more by scanning code to discover and inventory open source and third-party packages.

name: swift-package-sbom-generator
description: A software bill of materials (SBOM) generator for Swift packages

name: SRC:CLR SBOM Generator
description: Generates a Software Bill of Materials in CycloneDX JSON Format from Veracode SCA Agent results.

name: NowSecure Platform
description: NowSecure automates security and privacy testing of mobile applications through static and dynamic binary analysis. NowSecure identifies packages and native components bundled with mobile apps and exports inventory in CycloneDX format.

name: Ion Channel Platform
description: Ion Channel is a software supply chain assurance platform that transforms software inventory data into positive control of known and potential risks. Ion Channel consumes, analyzes, and exports CycloneDX SBOMs.

name: CycloneDX for Conan
description: Creates CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for C/C++ projects using Conan

name: Checkov
description: Prevent cloud misconfigurations during build-time for Terraform, Cloudformation, Kubernetes, Serverless framework and other infrastructure-as-code-languages with Checkov by Bridgecrew. Can output to CycloneDX.

name: SBOM CLI
description: Creates CycloneDX SBOMs from Kubernetes Helm charts

name: CxSCA
description: Checkmarx SCA is a Software Composition Analysis (SCA) platform that can produce CycloneDX SBOMs

name: Ochrona CLI
description: A command line tool for detecting vulnerabilities in Python dependencies and doing safe package installs. Output CycloneDX of all dependencies.

name: pip-audit
description: Audits Python environments and dependency trees for known vulnerabilities. Generates CycloneDX SBOM of vulnerable components.

name: RKVST SBOM Hub
description: A free SaaS repo to find and fetch public or private CycloneDX v1.4 BOMs. RKVST sustains and enhances SaaS/S/H/C-BOM or VEX publishing and consumption by tracing provenance, governing permissioned distribution and proving immutable assurance...

name: WpBom
description: WordPress integration with OWASP CycloneDX and Dependency Track

name: Meterian BOSS scanner
description: Software composition analysis for codebases providing precise and comprehensive CycloneDX SBOMs for open source and private source code projects. Supports all major ecosystems Java, NodeJS, .NET, Go, Rust, Swift, Python, Ruby, PHP, C/C++, Perl

name: Spack
description: Spack is a package manager for supercomputers, Linux, and macOS. The package managers can export inventory in CycloneDX.

name: build-info-go
description: build-info-go is a Go library and a CLI, which allows generating build-info and CycloneDX for a source code project.

name: Kyverno
description: Kyverno is a policy engine designed for Kubernetes. It can validate, mutate, and generate configurations using admission controls and background scans.

name: jbom
description: jbom generates a CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for apps on a running JVM

name: KICS
description: Find security vulnerabilities, compliance issues, and infrastructure misconfigurations early in the development cycle of your infrastructure-as-code with KICS by Checkmarx.

name: Xray
description: JFrog Xray is a software composition analysis (SCA) solution that proactively identifies vulnerabilities and license violations in open source. Xray generates CycloneDX SBOMs.
